title: Source code of protocols of the Research Institute for Nature and Forest (INBO)
description: This archive provides the source code of protocols used at the Research Institute for Nature and Forest (INBO), Brussels, Belgium (www.inbo.be). The protocols are written in R markdown and are compiled as html and pdf using the bookdown package. The website with the compiled protocols (including older versions) is at https://protocols.inbo.be.
